tag_list: vc, venture-capital, equity-exchange-fund, silicon-valley, nyc, london
overview:
*Venture Capital, Founder & General Partner at The Founders Club, a family of venture capital equity exchange funds and direct secondary fund

*Co-founder & co-chairman of Georgetown Alumni Angels

*Previously Managing Partner at Georgetown Venture Partners (GVP), former non-exec on 15+ tech boards

*Entrepreneur, co-founder & President of The Global TeleExchange (The GTX), a 90-person (PSTN-VoIP) telecom minutes and bandwidth exchange, facilitated a $25 million vendor financing package with Lucent and raised additional cash funding of over $50M from VCs

*Technical, co-founded UNIX systems administration outsourcing business in Silicon Valley and NYC

*Valuation expert, industry leading expert on venture capital valuations. Discuss valuations that closed recently on a daily basis with CEOs across sectors, stage and geographies. Advise CEOs and VCs on valuations in complex multi-VC cross border transactions

*Preeminent network among entrepreneurs, VCs, fund of funds investors in venture capital and angels on a global basis. Advise fund of funds on which VCs to invest in

*Negotiated complex agreements for fiber optic network build for Sarajevo, Bosnia-Herzegovina during I-FOR stage of conflict during 1990’s in addition to multi-million dollar contracts in Czech, Slovak, Austrian, Slovenian, Croatian and Hungarian Republics.

*Fluent in English, French and German, conversant in Czech and Slovak, BA in Politics, French and German literature from the University of Vermont, Duke University, Freie UniversitÃ¤t Berlin & Humboldt UniversitÃ¤t zu Berlin, MBA in Finance from Georgetown University completed on scholarship

*International, born in Japan, grew up in New Jersey and Paris, graduated as class president at Ecole Acive Bilangue in Paris with over 40 nationalities in the class body. Romans is a dual national holding American and British passports

*Charity, donated 10% of sales to charity from Universities for Choice, a successful past venture. Cofounded and support Founders Foundation, Children’s Charity Venture Capital Fund as a Trustee
